item.description:
Members of Capital Classics Theater Company lead a series of discussions on Shakespeare plays. This month it's Hamlet. Topics will include: major themes, character motives and actors'insights into performing Shakespeare.

All plays are available online forfree at: http://internetshakes...

REGISTER now to attend this series, by calling 860-561-6998or emailing: shakespeare@westhartfordlibrary.org. Seating is limited.The only requirement for attending is to have seen or read the play.

Note: A film adaptation of each play will be shown at 2:30 p.m. on theday of each discussion at the Noah Webster Library (film attendance isoptional). The Discussion begins at 7pm.

Park in the Isham Garage and bring your parking ticket to thelibrary for validation. Program flier is here:http://www.tinyurl.co...

Future Discussions:
Jan. 20, 2010 - Macbeth
May 5, 2010 - A Midsummer Night's Dream
item.name: Living Breathing Shakespeare - Hamlet
